General.Name: Compagnie du Cambodge
General.Description: Compagnie du Cambodge, together with its subsidiaries, provides transportation and logistics services in France. It operates a railway concession linking Burkina Faso with Ivory Coast. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Puteaux, France. Compagnie du Cambodge is a subsidiary of Plantations Des Terres Rouges S.A.

1.Name: Mr. Cédric  de Bailliencourt
1.Title: CFO & Vice Chairman of the Supervisory Board

2.Name: Mr. Emmanuel  Fossorier
2.Title: Director of Financial Communication & Member of the Management Board
